questions.question: Which one of these events was NOT a trigger event for the Civil War?

choices.answer: Missouri Compromise
Abe Lincoln's election
John Brown's Raid
invention of the telegraph

questions.question: The Battle of Fort Sumter was the 1st battle of the American Civil War.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Which of these was not a provision of the Missouri Compromise?

choices.answer: 36,30 line dividing free and slave states.
Admission of Maine as a free state.
The immediate release of third generation slaves.
Admission of Missouri as a slave state.

questions.question: What line was drawn in the Missouri Compromise (above-slavery, below-no slavery)?

choices.answer: 42nd parallel
49th parallel
most effective revolt at stemming the spread of slavery
most violent slave uprising in the US
least popular political revolt in U.S. history
least damaging uprising to the abolitionist caus
the election of Martin Van Buren.
banning slavery in any lands the U.S. acquired from Mexico.
California entering the Union as a slave state.
a pro-slavery government in Kansas.

questions.question: Which of the following was NOT a provision of the Compromise of 1850

choices.answer: California was admitted to the Union as a free state.
The slave trade was abolished in Washington D.C.
A harsher fugitive slave act was enacted
Maine joined the union as a free state

questions.question: What was the MAJOR impact of  Uncle Toms Cabin

choices.answer: the profits from book sales went up
support grew for the abolitionist movement
it made the north want more slaves
the south was mad about this novel
states to decide to have slavery within their borders or not
slaves to be free
states to secede from the union
free land to immigrants

questions.question: Dred Scott was granted his freedom after the Supreme Court recognized him as a man.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: The original Lincoln-Douglas debates were about..

choices.answer: the American Revolution
slavery
women's rights
health care

questions.question: Why did John Brown raid the arsenal at Harper's Ferry?

choices.answer: so he and his people could overthrow the gov't
arm slaveholders so they could protect themselves
arm slaves to start a revolt
so he could protest against slavery

questions.question: Which answer best summarizes why South Carolina seceded from the Union?

choices.answer: Re-Election of James Buchanan in 1860
Election of Abraham Lincoln in 1860
Defeat of Stephan Douglas in 1860
the failure of SC's electoral votes in 1860

questions.question: Which of the following was the direct effect of the Battle at Fort Sumter

choices.answer: Union quickly regained control  and ended the confederacy
Lincoln requested the confederacy to secede from the Union
The Civil War had begun
It was bloody with many lives lost

questions.question: This side of the Civil War seceded

choices.answer: The Union
The Confederacy
